column5: You want to understand how organisations operate in today’s global marketplace and how the different functions of management (such as strategy and operations) link together. You have little or no prior experience in business or management but want a successful management career (this is a good conversion course for those students from other academic disciplines who want to widen their employment opportunities after graduating). You want to be taught and supervised by leading academics who use innovative teaching methods.Management is about working with and through others in an efficient and effective manner to achieve organisational goals.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
